tool_description: Monitors and ensures compliance with legal, regulatory, and organizational requirements for volunteer management including background checks, training, and documentation.

volunteer_ids.description: List of volunteer IDs to check compliance for

compliance_categories.description: Categories to check: background_check, training, documentation, certifications

generate_report.description: Whether to generate detailed compliance report

error_messages: No volunteers specified: At least one volunteer ID must be provided.
Invalid compliance categories: Valid categories are background_check, training, documentation, certifications.
Invalid jurisdiction: Jurisdiction must be a valid state, province, or country code.
Invalid organization type: Organization type not recognized in compliance database.
Invalid audit level: Audit level must be basic, standard, or comprehensive.
Compliance check failed: Unable to complete compliance verification for one or more volunteers.
usage: Provide volunteer IDs, compliance categories to check, jurisdiction, and organization type. Optionally specify audit level and report generation. The tool performs comprehensive compliance checking.

compliant_volunteers.description: Volunteer IDs that are fully compliant

next_review_date.description: Date when compliance should be reviewed again

report_url.description: URL to detailed compliance report if generated
